scripts.start-production-process: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start ./index.js --name wiki-globe-production && pm2 logs wiki-globe-production --nostream --lines 30
scripts.post-receive: echo 'Deployment beginning' >> wiki-globe-deploy-log.txt && echo 'Updating wiki-globe from git' >> wiki-globe-deploy-log.txt && git fetch origin master && git reset --hard origin/master && echo 'npm installing' >> wiki-globe-deploy-log.txt && npm i && echo 'Migrating the database' >> wiki-globe-deploy-log.txt && npm run migrate-db-prod && echo 'Restarting the node process and finishing up' >> wiki-globe-deploy-log.txt && pm2 restart wiki-globe-production
